name: Science of Aggression
description:
Made for VimJam 3.0

Theme: Multi-Use

The Boomerang is used as a weapon, a syringe, and sometimes to insta-kill enemies.

Use arrow keys/WASD to move.

Click to throw the boomerang.

Survive as long as you can. 

When you fill the boomerang syringe, you can bring it to the table and run experiments on it. There are 3 results:

Health Potion

Insta-Kill Boomerang

Nothing
